participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Active and sporty, enjoys outdoor activities and has a friendly demeanor.
participant_1.background: I have been in 2 car crashes in my life. I am going to school to get a degree now. I like to play sports and get fresh air. Food and water are essential to me in life. I like watching tv in my free time as well.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Energetic and sociable, she has a bright outlook on life despite her challenges.
participant_2.background: My favorite singer is Justin Bieber. My doctor told me I have six months to live. I am really terrible at doing regular expressions. I like having fried fish for supper. I am allergic to lactose.

content.text: Nice to meet you, Sarah. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play sports and get fresh air.
Oh, that's cool. I like to play sports too. What kind of sports do you like to play?
I like to play basketball, soccer, and softball.
Those are all great sports. I like to play basketball too. I'm not very good at soccer, but I enjoy playing it. I've never played softball before.
Softball is a lot of fun. It's a good workout too.
I'm sure it is. I'll have to give it a try sometime.
You should. It's a great way to meet new people and get some exercise.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch TV and go out to eat.
Me too. I love to watch TV. What are some of your favorite shows?
I like to watch a variety of shows, but my favorites are usually comedies.
I like comedies too. I like to watch The Office, Parks and Rec, and The Good Place.
I love those shows! I also like Brooklyn Nine-Nine, and New Girl.
Those are great shows too. I'm glad we have similar taste in TV shows.
Me too. It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
